# Course Checklist Template

Use this checklist to verify an entire course is production-ready.

---

## Course: [COURSE_NAME]
**Category:** [Business-Professional / Technical-Development / Team-Specific / University]
**Target Duration:** [X hours]
**Reviewer:** [NAME]
**Date:** [DATE]

---

## 1. Course Structure

### Required Root Files

| File | Present | Complete | Notes |
|------|---------|----------|-------|
| README.md | [ ] | [ ] | Course overview, value prop |
| SYLLABUS.md | [ ] | [ ] | Complete curriculum outline |
| PREREQUISITES.md | [ ] | [ ] | Required knowledge/setup |
| SETUP.md | [ ] | [ ] | Environment setup guide |
| INSTRUCTOR-GUIDE.md | [ ] | [ ] | Teaching notes, timing |
| GRADING-GUIDE.md | [ ] | [ ] | Assessment criteria |

### Required Directories

| Directory | Present | Complete | Notes |
|-----------|---------|----------|-------|
| modules/ | [ ] | [ ] | All course modules |
| final-project/ | [ ] | [ ] | Capstone project |
| prompts/ | [ ] | [ ] | AI prompt library |
| resources/ | [ ] | [ ] | Additional materials |
| templates/ | [ ] | [ ] | Reusable templates |

---

## 2. Module Completion

| # | Module Name | Checklist Score | Status |
|---|-------------|-----------------|--------|
| 01 | | /35 | [ ] Pass / [ ] Fail |

| 03 | | /35 | [ ] Pass / [ ] Fail |

| 08 | | /35 | [ ] Pass / [ ] Fail |

| 10 | | /35 | [ ] Pass / [ ] Fail |
| 11 | | /35 | [ ] Pass / [ ] Fail |
| 12 | | /35 | [ ] Pass / [ ] Fail |

**All modules must pass (30+/35) before course can be approved.**

---

## 3. Final Project

### Project Documentation

| Item | Present | Complete |
|------|---------|----------|
| README.md (project description) | [ ] | [ ] |
| rubric.md (grading criteria) | [ ] | [ ] |
| example/ (sample solution) | [ ] | [ ] |
| starter-code/ (if applicable) | [ ] | [ ] |

### Project Quality

- [ ] Clear project description and goals
- [ ] Realistic scope for course duration
- [ ] Rubric covers all evaluation criteria
- [ ] Example solution demonstrates expectations
- [ ] Resources/hints provided appropriately

---

## 4. Instructor Materials

### Teaching Support

- [ ] Lesson plans with timing for each module
- [ ] Discussion questions / facilitation guides
- [ ] Common student questions and answers
- [ ] Troubleshooting guide for technical issues
- [ ] Extension activities for fast learners

### Assessment Support

- [ ] Complete quiz answer keys
- [ ] Grading rubrics for all assignments
- [ ] Sample student work at different levels
- [ ] Feedback templates

### Presentation Materials (if applicable)

- [ ] Slide decks for each module
- [ ] Speaker notes included
- [ ] Consistent branding/formatting
- [ ] Editable format (PPTX/Google Slides)

---

## 5. Course Metadata

### Basic Information

- [ ] Target audience clearly defined
- [ ] Prerequisites accurately listed
- [ ] Duration estimate realistic (tested)
- [ ] Learning outcomes measurable
- [ ] Course level appropriate (beginner/intermediate/advanced)

### Catalog Information

- [ ] Course description (2-3 paragraphs)
- [ ] Key topics/skills list
- [ ] Tools/technologies covered
- [ ] Certification details (if applicable)

---

## 6. Quality Validation

### Content Review

- [ ] Subject matter expert review completed
- [ ] Instructional design review completed
- [ ] All feedback incorporated
- [ ] No known content issues

### Technical Review

- [ ] All code examples tested
- [ ] All links verified
- [ ] All downloads/resources accessible
- [ ] Cross-platform compatibility verified

### Pilot Testing

- [ ] Tested with 3-5 actual students
- [ ] Completion rate measured: _____%
- [ ] Average satisfaction score: _____/5.0
- [ ] Time to complete vs estimate: _____%
- [ ] All critical feedback addressed

---

## 7. Language & Accessibility

### Language

- [ ] Consistent language throughout (specify: English / Spanish / Other)
- [ ] No mixed languages unintentionally
- [ ] Spell check passed
- [ ] Grammar check passed
- [ ] Reading level appropriate for audience

### Accessibility

- [ ] Alt text on all images
- [ ] Proper heading structure
- [ ] Color contrast sufficient
- [ ] Screen reader compatible
- [ ] Captions for videos (if any)

---

## 8. Delivery Readiness

### Platform Setup

- [ ] Course structure created in LMS
- [ ] All content uploaded and organized
- [ ] Navigation tested
- [ ] Enrollment process verified

### Support Materials

- [ ] FAQ document created
- [ ] Support contact information included
- [ ] Community/discussion setup (if applicable)
- [ ] Certificate template ready

---

## Verification Summary

| Category | Items | Passing | Status |
|----------|-------|---------|--------|
| Course Structure | 11 | /11 | [ ] Pass |
| Module Completion | [X] modules | /[X] | [ ] Pass |
| Final Project | 9 | /9 | [ ] Pass |
| Instructor Materials | 14 | /14 | [ ] Pass |
| Course Metadata | 9 | /9 | [ ] Pass |
| Quality Validation | 11 | /11 | [ ] Pass |
| Language & Accessibility | 9 | /9 | [ ] Pass |
| Delivery Readiness | 7 | /7 | [ ] Pass |

**All categories must pass for production approval.**

## Production Certification

**Course Name:** ________________________________

**Certification Statement:**

This course has been reviewed against all quality criteria and is certified as production-ready for delivery to students.

- [ ] All checklist items verified
- [ ] All issues resolved
- [ ] Pilot testing completed successfully
- [ ] Instructor materials complete

**Approved By:** ________________________________

**Date:** ________________________________

**Version:** ________________________________

## Post-Launch Tracking

| Metric | Target | Actual | Notes |
|--------|--------|--------|-------|
| Enrollment (Month 1) | | | |
| Completion Rate | >70% | | |
| Satisfaction Score | >4.0/5.0 | | |
| Support Tickets | <5% of students | | |
| Time to Complete | +/- 20% of estimate | | |
